title: incident.io Integration
description:
Add incident.io as modern incident platform backend:

1. REST API v2 integration
2. Catalog management (sync services)
3. Alert routing rules
4. Escalation paths
5. Backstage integration compatible

Effort: 1 week
Priority: P1 - modern alternative, growing fast

comments.author: roadmap-prune
comments.text: Deferred: One incident platform (PagerDuty) is enough for now
